name: MergingLife
description:
This is a game about creating alien life!

It was made in 10 days for the JamCraft5 game jam. It was a struggle to complete at the end but I finally did it!

How to play?

 - Drag items on top of each other to merge them, and create a new item.

- The goal of the game is to create an alien.

- There is a hint box if you need help. Alternatively, you can use the walkthrough on the left.
